pages.text: "A QIO-linked redstone adapter. Use to monitor your QIO system's contents."$(p)The QIO Redstone Adapter (QIO-RA) is used to give a redstone signal output if the specific threshold is reached/exceeded (can be set in the QIO Redstone Adapter's GUI).

pages.title: GUI
pages.text: $(bold)Item Type$()$(br)The QIO-RA has an empty slot to it's left. Here you can choose which block for the QIO-RA to specifically detect for. $(p)$(bold)Trigger Count$()$(br)The trigger count is a number that you will set as the threshold. If the Stored Count reaches/exceeds this number, then a redstone signal (15 strength) will be outputted.

pages.title: GUI
pages.text: $(bold)Stored Count$()$(br)The Stored Count is the total number of the specified item in the QIO system.
